channel.title: iam on Today I Learned
channel.description: Recent content in iam on Today I Learned

item.description: About IfExists AWS IAM conditions: if a condition key might not exist (the resource doesn’t have it built-in, or a tag isn’t set), you can append IfExists to the condition test. For example StringEquals -> StringEqualsIfExists. See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/IAM/latest/UserGuide/reference_policies_elements_condition_operators.html#Conditions_IfExists
